Spell Affinities

Spell affinities in Remixed Pixel Dungeon are categories that group spells based on their magical properties and the classes that can use them. Each hero class has a primary affinity that determines which spells they can effectively use.

Affinity Types

  • Common Affinity - Basic spells available to most classes
  • Elemental Affinity - Fire, ice, and nature-based spells
  • Necromancy Affinity - Undead and death-related spells
  • Combat Affinity - Offensive and defensive spells
  • Rogue Affinity - Stealth and agility spells
  • Witchcraft Affinity - Magic and manipulation spells
  • Huntress Affinity - Nature and charm spells
  • Elf Affinity - Natural magic spells
  • Priest Affinity - Healing and sanctity spells
  • Plague Doctor Affinity - Disease and toxic spells

Affinity Mechanics

  • Each hero class has a primary affinity which determines spell effectiveness
  • Spells used outside of one's primary affinity may be less effective
  • The level of magic affinity can affect spell power and mana costs
  • Some classes can gain access to additional affinities through talents or special means

Classes and Their Affinities

  • Warrior - Combat Affinity
  • Mage - Elemental Affinity
  • Rogue - Rogue Affinity
  • Huntress - Huntress Affinity
  • Elf - Elf Affinity
  • Necromancer - Necromancy Affinity
  • Gnoll - Witchcraft Affinity
  • Priest - Priest Affinity
  • Doctor - Plague Doctor Affinity
